2.text: Paint and decorate the shoebox if desired.
2.vid: /1/18/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Set the box on an angle.
3.vid: /7/7c/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 3.360p.mp4

4.vid: /e/ef/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 4.360p.mp4

5.vid: /9/9c/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 5.360p.mp4

6.vid: /2/22/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Create a ball launcher to start with.
7.vid: /4/48/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 7.360p.mp4

8.vid: /2/22/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Add flippers to your pinball table.
9.vid: /8/88/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Add obstacles to the playing field.
10.vid: /8/8c/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 10.360p.mp4

12.text: Make a paper plate marble maze.
12.vid: /3/36/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 12.360p.mp4

13.vid: /1/1e/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 13.360p.mp4

14.text: Make sure children have adequate supervision when handling tools.

16.text: Create a skee ball game similar to one described on the Momtastic site.
16.vid: /2/23/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 16.360p.mp4

17.text: Play the game by rolling tennis balls up the ramp and into the plastic containers.
17.vid: /2/27/Make Pinball Games Out of Cardboard Step 17.360p.mp4

18.text: Fold up the ramp and put the box away when you're finished playing.
